reviewText:
AVAST!
Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum and all  that mess! So we have come across a particular imaginative amalgamation of uninteresting ideas strewn across a field of boring ho hum grey empty corridors of so called subliminal atrocities that in no way shape or manner amuse or excite the mind into anything more that laying in the snow waiting to decompose! I'll pass and in place of this atrocity, i'll open my mouth and dump in fire ants along with a cup of honey. Good day sir.
Everything I personally like in a movie. Nudity, booze and gore add to that alot of raunchy humor. This movie is absolutely hilarious. Especially the ending.

SPOILER ALERT!

ZOMBEAVER!  That's the spoiler but there is much to see regarding this zombeaver.  You will be shocked and haunted for many years after viewing this.

This movie is so much fun!  It puts the camp in camping!  It puts the it in vomit!  It puts the oo in boobies!  A great blend of gore, nudity and comedy along with some animation and puppetry.  Does it get any better?  I don't think so.

This movie is sick! Blood, guts, sex, boobs, perfection! Not to mention, the dialogue and story line are to die for. Very funny, and well made B-Horror film. Definitely worth your time and money to watch over and over again! This movie is surely to become a cult classic!

Blood Orgy at Beaver lake is a funny,disgusting, off the wall movie that has it all. There is hot girls, bikinis, boobs, bongs, inbred readnecks, moonshine, and of course beaver. When a group of friends head to beaver lake for a weekend of fun in the sun they get more then they bargained for when 2 inbred hillabilly brothers making moonshine find a barrel of a new drug "Sextasy 69", After adding the drug to newest batch of moonshine they turn into horny, blood lusting zombies, while this is going on the friends are having fun boozing it up, getting high and getting horny while in the background a little beaver is trying the new shine as well. if you want a funny movie in the Troma pictures style then this is it!
This movie could cause you to wet yourself. My favourite part of the whole movie has to be when the Beaver **********************. Defiantly worth picking up.
